provider_select_note: Select a provider to apply their standard rates automatically, or choose 'Other' to enter them manually.
about_text: TRICINTY is an app to help you track and reduce your electricity consumption.
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this reading?
alert_peak_message: Your recent consumption rate is up by {percentage}%. Check for running appliances.
alert_reduction_message: Great job! Your recent consumption rate is down by {percentage}%.
privacy_policy_content: Your data is stored locally on your device and is not shared with any third parties. We do not collect any personal information.
disclaimer_content: The bill predictions and consumption data are estimates for informational purposes only. Actual results may vary. We are not responsible for any discrepancies.
set_monthly_goal_description: Set a monthly spending goal for your electricity bill.
goal_progress_percent: You've used {percentage}% of your monthly budget.
advice_initial_prompt: Click the button below to get an energy-saving tip!
advice_unplug: Unplug chargers and electronics when not in use. Many devices draw 'phantom power' even when turned off.
advice_led: Switch to LED bulbs. They use up to 85% less energy and last much longer than traditional incandescent bulbs.
advice_cold_wash: Wash your clothes in cold water. About 90% of the energy a washing machine uses is for heating the water.
advice_thermostat: Adjust your thermostat by a few degrees. Lowering it in winter and raising it in summer can lead to significant savings.
advice_appliances: Use energy-efficient appliances. Look for the ENERGY STAR label when buying new electronics.
advice_fridge: Keep your refrigerator and freezer full. An empty fridge uses more energy to stay cool. Also, check the door seals.
advice_drafts: Seal air leaks and drafts around windows and doors to prevent heat loss in winter and keep cool air in during summer.
confirm_delete_all_message: Are you sure you want to delete all reading data? This action cannot be undone.
install_pwa_prompt: For a full-screen, app-like experience, install TRICINTY to your device's home screen using your browser's 'Add to Home Screen' option.
please_confirm_country: To provide accurate calculations, please select your country.
welcome_other_country_note: You can select your provider from a list in the settings, or enter tariffs manually.
landing_title: Take Control of Your Electricity Bill
landing_subtitle: TRICINTY helps you track consumption, predict bills, and save money with smart energy advice. All your data stays private on your device.
feature_track_text: Manually add your meter readings anytime to see your exact consumption.
feature_predict_text: Get an accurate prediction of your monthly bill based on your current usage.
feature_advice_text: Receive personalized, actionable tips to reduce your electricity consumption.
install_pwa_text: For quick access and a full-screen experience, add TRICINTY to your home screen. It's fast, works offline, and feels like a native app.
install_android_steps: 1. Tap the menu button (three dots). 2. Select 'Install app' or 'Add to Home screen'.
install_ios_steps: 1. Tap the Share button. 2. Scroll down and select 'Add to Home Screen'.
